sections.general:
SALES
Career Focus
Sales and Marketing expertise includes over 15 years in the Atlanta Real Estate Industry with professional awards and multi million dollars in sales
volume yearly. As an Independent Contractor, I managed all aspects of sales,marketing, human resources, advertising and tax accountability with
one assistant.
I have also been the business manager part time for a local bicycle store a well as working full time building clientele for a major retailer and iconic
internationally recognized cosmetics firm.

awareness of client needs/interests as well as upper ideas for development and management goals
